medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 day prior to presentation. Initial diffuse abdominal pain evolved into focal right lower quadrant pain. The patient is passing stools and flatus. Denies fever and chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Psoriasis, hip pain, chondromalacia patellae. Past surgical history includes hip injections and right knee arthroscopy.
